articles.description: Egypt forward Mohamed Salah says his future at Liverpool is 'out of his hands' because he is yet to be offered a new deal.
articles.title: Liverpool: Mohamed Salah 'disappointed' by club's failure to offer new contract

articles.description: England's game against Ireland in the Six Nations could be a 'line in the sand' for England, while Scotland are among Championship favourites, says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: Matt Dawson column: Six Nations game against Ireland could be 'line in sand' for England

articles.description: Vinicius Jr is doubtful for Real Madrid's Champions League match against Liverpool because of a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr injured before Real Madrid match against Liverpool

articles.description: Man City boss Pep Guardiola says it is tough for his players to "defend a legacy" and questions why he should change his tactics despite the club's dip in form.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola not planning changes despite five successive defeats

articles.description: How Australia cricket is still affected - and will continue to be so - by the death of Phillip Hughes 10 years ago.
articles.title: Phillip Hughes: Australia batter remembered 10 years on

articles.description: A depressing revamp of the LPGA Tour's season-ending tournament resulted in an inappropriately low-key finish for Lexi Thompson, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Lexi Thompson justifiably angry at low-key finish to full-time LPGA Tour career

articles.description: India complete a stunning 295-run win over Australia in the first Test in Perth to continue their extraordinary run in the country.
articles.title: India beat Australia by 295 runs in first Test in Perth

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs win on the last kick of the game to go 10-1 for the season, while the Dallas Cowboys end a five-game losing streak after a wild finish.
articles.title: NFL results & week 12 recap: Kansas City Chiefs go 10-1 and Dallas Cowboys win thriller

articles.description: Ivory Coast record the lowest total in men's T20I history as they are bowled out for seven runs against Nigeria.
articles.title: Ivory Coast record lowest total in men's T20I history - bowled out for seven runs

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim expects his side to suffer for a long time after seeing them start his management era with draw at Ipswich.
articles.title: Ipswich Town 1-1 Man Utd: Why Ruben Amorim expects side to suffer for long period
